top_positive.sent: Our commitment to these priorities, the strength of our brands, the breadth of our global footprint and a commitment to profitability and driving efficiency in cash generation should position us well to manage through the challenges we face and increase shareholder value over time.

forward_snippets: This guidance is effective for the Company for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2026 and is not expected to have an impact on the Company’s Consolidated Financial Statements.

2025-03, “Business Combinations (Topic 805) and Consolidation (Topic 810): Determining the Accounting Acquirer in the Acquisition of a Variable Interest Entity.” This ASU clarifies the guidance regarding the identification of the accounting acquirer in a business combination in which the legal acquiree is a variable interest entity.
